comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

In using GoDaddy's web mail, if I attach a file, the file dialog is presented once to select a file then, after the file has been selected and uploaded, the file dialog is presented again.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. You would need access to GoDaddy web mail. Compose a new message.
2. Click Add Attachment.
3. Select a file.
4. Second file dialog appears.
Actual Results:  
File dialog appears twice.

Expected Results:  
No further dialogs after a file is selected.

comments.raw_text:
Works for me.
Verified with 4.0 RC1
Could you please try with new profile:
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Managing+profiles#Creating_a_profile

comments.creator: srinivas@smartware.com
comments.text:
Please ignore previous comments.

Could reproduce this bug with a precondition: Allow Pop ups for this site.

Verified in 4.0 RC:
- With "Allow Pop ups": second file dialog appears
- Without "Allow Pop ups": second file dialog do not appear

Build Worked:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b5pre) Gecko/20100827 Firefox/4.0b5pre
Build Broken:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b5pre) Gecko/20100828 Firefox/4.0b5pre
comments.author: srinivas@smartware.com
comments.raw_text:
Please ignore previous comments.

Could reproduce this bug with a precondition: Allow Pop ups for this site.

Verified in 4.0 RC:
- With "Allow Pop ups": second file dialog appears
- Without "Allow Pop ups": second file dialog do not appear

Build Worked:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b5pre) Gecko/20100827 Firefox/4.0b5pre
Build Broken:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b5pre) Gecko/20100828 Firefox/4.0b5pre

comments.text:
Yes -- I did have FF configured to allow pop-ups. When I removed that condition, the extra window did not show up, although FF told me it had blocked a popup.

I don't know if it's a bug or not, but thanks for diagnosing the issue.

BTW, really like the new version -- the speed is very nice.

Thanks!

Jim Grinstead
comments.author: jim@sportsvenues.com
comments.creator: jim@sportsvenues.com
